attributes.action: Trigger a snap election. We the people demand a vote of no confidence!
attributes.additional_details: Put pressure on your MP'S to debate an act of no confidence under the current government!!! This is the only way to trigger an early election.
attributes.background: House of Commons needs to vote no confidence with at least two thirds in favour of the motion;  Aside from these triggers there is no way to replace the Government through an early General Election.
